li.label: innocent prisoner died
li.description: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. He is now harmless in someother place better than this one.

li.label: justified execution
li.description: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified.

li.label: someone was euthanized
li.description: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, better off this way.

li.label: someone was executed
li.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood.

li.label: someone organ-harvested
li.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him.

li.label: someone's organ harvested
li.description: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's for the greater good.
